The course is complimentary and runs approximately 1.5 hours long. If the course is not completed before your site goes Live the Home Search tool will need to be hidden.
Please note the Ethics Course is only offered once a month and the next course is Wednesday, [Date and Time]
Please click HERE to register for the course.
Lastly, Compass requires agents to sign the Compass Indemnity Agreement before the Broker of Record (Elizabeth Ann Stribling-Kivlan) can sign the IDX request form. If you could please reach out to your Sales Manager to complete the Indemnity Agreement.
Let me know if you have any questions, I am happy to help!
